Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hunk \Hunk\, n. [Cf. {Hunch}.] 1. A large lump or piece; a hunch; as, a hunk of bread. [Colloq.]
2. a sexually attractive, well-built man. [PJC]
hunk n 1: a well-built sexually attractive man 2: a large piece of something without definite shape; "a hunk of bread"; "a lump of coal" [syn: {lump}]
